I gave up on big minigames, and Mopar servers… Now I just chat here. xD

item.title: Need some one to teach me java and servers!
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Haha, true.

My experience: teach a total nooby some programming languages, they sit around and use 1/1000 of what you taught for things like ‘sendMessage’ and shit that you could learn WITHOUT another person, just by viewing. Then they end up forgetting everything…

item.title: Need some one to teach me java and servers!
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote="• Java Maybe •, post:10, topic:199864"][quote author=Owner Zerk link=topic=264522.msg2186966#msg2186966 date=1208223027]

come on someone teach me it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2008, 01:51:03 PM[/size][hr]anybody???

Hmm… I don’t know. Didn’t somebody just give you a link on how to learn Java? I must be wrong.

LOL!!!

Just a question… how old are you?
Click here for personal tutor

Nah. I’m not wrong. Go learn. I doubt anyone will teach you anything, unless you’ve got some moola.
[/quote]

I teached about 10 people, to program ‘decent’[/quote]Decent… meaning… knowing how to declare a variable and maybe a few voids.

item.description:
@Volrom wrote:

Jayko,

I’ll be glade to help you learn Java, though I will not always be on. Add me to your PM list, and I’ll pm you small tuts for learning Java. Though I still use old Java methods (Like a Logical Variable, Existed since 1990s). Just keep this topic open, and I’ll post tuts here and, as said before, will also pm some.

-Volrom
